column10: (ko)tâtou (inclusive), (ko)matou (exclusive), taûa (dual: you and I), maûa (dual: he and I)
poki tamaaroa/poki tane (boy), poki tamahahine/poki vahine (girl)

column9: kure, ñadu (brother's), fillka (older brother's), ümwe (younger brother's), püñmo (son's, daughter-in-law)
